definitions.text: something additional of the same kind
examples: he always carried extras in case of an emergency

definitions.text: a copy that corresponds to an original exactly
examples: he made a duplicate for the files

definitions.text: make or do or perform again
examples: He could never replicate his brilliant performance of the magic trick
The polished surface twinned his face and chest in reverse

definitions.text: make a duplicate or duplicates of
examples: Could you please duplicate this letter for me?
